Sentencas: The increasing quality and durability of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) state-of-the-art materials renders the long-term testing of fuel cells difficult since considerably long equipment times are needed to obtain valuable results.
Titulo: Segmented cell testing for cathode parameter investigation

Sentencas: Moreover, reproducibility issues are common due to the high sensitivity of the performance and degradation on the testing conditions.
Titulo: Segmented cell testing for cathode parameter investigation

Sentencas: An original segmented cell configuration has been adopted in order to carry out four tests in parallel, thus decreasing the total experimental time and ensuring the same operating conditions for the four segments.
Titulo: Segmented cell testing for cathode parameter investigation

Sentencas: The investigation has been performed on both anode-supported cells and symmetrical Lanthanum-Strontium Manganite-Yttria-stabilized Zirconia (LSM-YSZ) electrolyte-supported cells.
Titulo: Segmented cell testing for cathode parameter investigation

Sentencas: In separate tests, the influence of variables like cathode thickness, current density and cathode composition on performance and degradation have been explored on anode-supported cells.
Titulo: Segmented cell testing for cathode parameter investigation

Sentencas: Furthermore, the effect of chromium poisoning has been studied on electrolyte-supported symmetric cells by contacting one segment with a chromium-iron interconnect material.
Titulo: Segmented cell testing for cathode parameter investigation

Sentencas: Long-term polarization of the segments is controlled with a multi-channel galvanostatic device designed in-house.
Titulo: Segmented cell testing for cathode parameter investigation

Sentencas: Electrochemical characterization has been performed through electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) at different H-2 partial pressures, temperatures and bias current, effectively demonstrating the direct impact of each studied variable on the cell performance and degradation behavior.
Titulo: Segmented cell testing for cathode parameter investigation

Sentencas: Segmented cell testing has been proven to be an effective strategy to achieve better reproducibility for SOFC measurements since it avoids the inevitable fluctuations found in a series of successively run tests.
Titulo: Segmented cell testing for cathode parameter investigation

Sentencas: Moreover, simultaneous testing increased n-fold the data output per experiment, implying a considerable economy of time.
Titulo: Segmented cell testing for cathode parameter investigation
